rules_text:
{R}: This creature becomes a Dwarf Scout with base power and toughness 2/2 and haste.
{R}{R}{R}: If this creature is a Scout, it becomes a Dwarf Warrior with base power and toughness 4/4, haste and first strike.
{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}: If this creature is a Warrior, it becomes a Dwarf Avatar with base power and toughness 6/6, haste, double strike, and trample.
